shirt.headline: Are you looking for a product that will save you from the burning sunshine?
paragraph: A shirt is a garment that is typically worn on the upper body and covers the torso. It is a versatile piece of clothing that comes in various styles, colors, and fabrics, catering to different fashion preferences and occasions.

Shirts generally have a collar, sleeves, and buttons down the front, allowing for easy wearing and removal. The collar can come in different styles such as point, spread, or button-down, each lending a unique aesthetic to the shirt. The sleeves can vary in length, ranging from long sleeves to short sleeves or even sleeveless.
specification: So much more comfortable to wear
